hits.definition:
委

[wěi] 委员会 wěiyuánhuì committee;

    委托 wěituō entrust

[wēi] 虚与委蛇 xūyǔwēiyí to pretend interest and sympathy

房

[fáng] (= 房间 fángjiān) room, (= 房子 fángzi) building

单 (F 單)

[dān] alone, single, sheet

[chán] 单于 chányú <hist.> chief of the Xiongnu

[Shàn] <family name>

据 (F 據)

[jù] seize, depend on, (= 根据 gēnjù) according to

[jū] 拮据 jiéjū short of money, hard up

似

[sì] similar;

    似乎 sìhu it seems

[shì] 似的 shìde alike
